DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether VPI-2690B Injection is effective in the treatment of diabetic nephropathy.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study to Evaluate Safety & Efficacy of VPI-2690B in Diabetic Nephropathy Patients
DOC.criteria: documented diabetic nephropathy in patients with either Type 1 or Type 2 diabetics HbA1c of 7.510.5% eGFR 30110 mL/min/1.73m2 stable ACEi/ARB dose regimen stable blood pressure BMI less than or equal to 45 kg/m2 nondiabetic renal disease history of solid organ or islet cell transplant history of malignancy within previous 5 years systemic immunosuppression therapy clinically significant liver disease, hepatitis B or C or HIV monoclonal antibody treatment within previous year recent acute renal injury or major surgery significant, recent body weight change biopsy proven glomerular disease
